data.name: GoChain
description: Minimal dockerized blockchain network written in Go with RESTful peer communication, dynamic node management, and basic proof-of-work consensus.

data.name: Maps to ATAK formatter
description: Dockerized tool to convert My Google Maps overlay into compatible format for use in ATAK.

data.name: Machine Learning with Java
description: Deep neural network to classify drawn digits 0-9. Project is written in Java and only needs a library for GUI.

data.name: Google - Gemini Long Context Competition
description: juur.ai is a web application developed for the 'Google - Gemini Long Context' competition and the University of Tartu IDS 2024 course.
The application leverages Gemini's high token capacity to efficiently analyze 390 laws.

data.name: Busiest time calculator
description: Command-line tool to calculate when most workers take breaks.

data.name: Portfolio website
description: Made this website in a day to showcase my projects and skills. It's styled to look like a terminal, because I like the simplicity.
